attributes.action: Introduce regulations and punishments in the Commons and Lords that are commensurate with other government bodies such as the Civil Service and the Armed Forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs and members of the Lords often claim that the rules that they have to comply with are confusing and use this as an excuse for wrong doing.  When they are found out they are not subjected to the same levels of punishment as the rest of the country.  For a number of recent offences members of the Armed Forces would not be able to claim that the rules are confusing, be sacked and may also have part of their pension withheld.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
